question: 長さ
sourceMnemonic: You know the word <ja>長い</ja> from a couple levels ago. This is like the word <ja>大きい</ja> versus <ja>大きさ</ja>, where <ja>大きさ</ja> is "size" and <ja>大きい</ja> is "big." So, <ja>長い</ja> is "long" and <ja>長さ</ja> is <vocabulary>length</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: If you know the reading of the word <ja>長い</ja> from level 6 you'll know the reading for this word too. Only difference is the <ja>さ</ja> at the end, which is hiragana so it should be easy to read.
